form.title: Bingo grids
form.description: Create grids of goals and tick them all. Perfect when doing reacts!

clear_labels_confirm.title: Clear cells?
clear_labels_confirm.description:
All cells will be cleared.
This cannot be undone..

form.param_additional_cells:
Additional cells
(will be used when shuffling the grid and randomly distributed to viewers)
form.param_winSoundVolume: Notification volume when a viewer has a bingo
form.param_autoHide: Automatically show/hide grid based on activities
form.param_overlayAnnouncement_permissions: Viewers allowed to be displayed on overlay
form.premium_limit: You reached the maximum bingo grid count you can create.
form.non_premium_limit:
@:bingo_grid.premium_limit 
Become a premium member to create up to {MAX} bingo grids.
form.share: Share this grid with your viewers

delete_confirm.description:
Bingo grid will be deleted
This cannot be undone.
delete_confirm.title: Delete grid?

form.premium_multiplayer:
Become premium to enable Multi player mode.
Anytime a viewer gets a bingo their name and score will show up on the overlay and on chat, you'll be able to show the leaderboard and your mods will be able to tick cells for you.
form.perf_alert:
Looks like you have quite a lot of viewers on your stream.
I can't guarantee my server will survive that, please make a little prayer before sharing the link with your viewers¬†üôè.

state.cell_disabled:
{USER} must
tick this cell
to enable it
state.mod_info: You're a moderator of this channel, the cells you tick will be enabled for everyone
state.additional_cells: Additional cells other viewers may have
